Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the role of Planned Parenthood by stating that they do nothing except profit from killing babies and selling body parts.
Understate: The claim understates the services provided by Planned Parenthood by stating that they are nothing more than a referral service.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to back up the assertion that Planned Parenthood only profits from killing babies and selling body parts.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Planned Parenthood does not provide any information or equipment to women, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the actions and services of Planned Parenthood.
